attributes.action: We lawfully left the EU on 29/03/2019 as it written in to UK law
attributes.background:
The government is ignoring the people who voted to leave the EU.
As they wrote the leaving date of 29/03/2019 into UK law.
We have already left lawfully with out a deal

rejection.details:
The date of exit day has been changed by law, by the European Union (Withdrawal) Act 2018 (Exit Day) (Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations
2019 (S.I., 2019, No. 859). 

You can see the current law here: 

http://www.legislation.gov.uk/uksi/2019/859/made
